title: Excess coverage permitted
context: ยง287-30 Excess coverage permitted. Any policy which grants the coverage required for a motor vehicle liability policy may also grant any lawful coverage in excess of or in addition to the coverage specified for a motor vehicle liability policy and the excess or additional coverage shall not be subject to this chapter. With respect to a policy which grants such excess or additional coverage the term &ldquo;motor vehicle liability policy&rdquo; shall apply only to that part of the coverage which is required by this chapter. [L 1949, c 393, pt of ยง1; RL 1955, ยง160-108; HRS ยง287-30]
